channel.title: How to add a npc
channel.description:
hey guys i need some help, well i got a server and im trying to add bandos to a certain location because i dont think he is in the game just yet, i have his ID code its 1115 and when i npc spawn that its him and he fights and everything but i cant seem to find him in the game so i was wondering can someone like help me put him in edgeville or something and ill move him from there
Many Thanks, Iamapker
P.S. sorry if someone posted a tut on this i used the search button but got nothin :confused:

item.title: How to add a npc
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

Lol duh, Thank you very much man you rock haha im dumb for that

Read full topic
